item.description:
This is a quick and fun 1-hour Networking session for our group (6-7pm). Come have a drink right after work and learn who all these cool girls are! OM is a gorgeous lounge in the heart of Harvard Square (Red Line, Harvard Stop).

We'll discover what everyone does for work, play, hobbies, etc. Let's find out if we have any connections to each other! You never know who you will meet that may be able to help or give advice on anything from: job transitions, finding a class, dating, travel, music, career/opportunity networking, fun upcoming events, volunteering, etc.

It's really great to come together as women and help each other to move forward in any way that we can!

Looking forward to meeting everyone. This event is free, although you will purchase your own beverages.
Best,
Bernadette
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the lounge/patio area, first floor - Bernadette cell: 617-372-3557
item.name: 1-Hour Networking at OM Lounge
